resources.description:
The Web Services provide access to datasets listed under database by themes, and
predefined tables listed under tables by themes.
resources.name: 4. JSON and UNICODE Web Services – data scope and query size

resources.description:
These SDMX Web Services are a programmatic access to Eurostat data, with the possibility to:

get a complete list of publicly available datasets.
 
detail the complete structure definition of a given dataset.
 
download a subset of a given dataset or a full dataset.
This operation allows customizing requests for data. You can choose which dimensions with which values you want to retrieve data for. Processing time and the resulting data depend on the query, where a small subset of a dataset could have size of a couple kilobytes and can be served in a couple of seconds whereas a full dataset could reach to a several megabytes and service time might take around several minutes.
resources.name: 1. SDMX Web Services

resources.description: The JSON & UNICODE Web Services are a programmatic access to Eurostat data, with the possibility to download a subset of a given dataset. This operation allows customizing requests for data. You can filter on dimensions to retrieve specific data subsets.
resources.name: 3. Json and Unicode Web Services

resources.description: Eurostat has created an easy to use tool which generates SDMX-compliant queries for a limited number of datasets. This is only an educational aid which can be used by software vendors to generate some example SDMX queries. These queries can then be exploited to learn how to obtain statistical data from the SDMX Web Service hosted at Eurostat. Next chapters of this guideline are describing in details steps required to construct SDMX queries from scratch.
resources.name: 2. SDMX Web Services – query builder
5. JSON and UNICODE Web Services – query builder

name: estat-web-services
title: Eurostat web services and dissemination APIs
